name: 96a77412-c147-517a-b39e-5bd9c4fecb1b
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Melpitz, Germany (20110101 - 20120101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Melpitz, Germany (20110101 - 20120101)
